revisions.rev:
{{Main|Commemorative coins of Poland}} Poland has a selection of [[gold]] and [[silver]] commemorative coins. In the year 1998 coins were launched in the series: "Polish Kings and Princes", "Castles and Palaces of Poland", "The Animals of the World" and various occasional coins. {|class="wikitable" width="100%" |- ! colspan="4" align=center style="background:#eeeeee;"| [[1998 Winter Olympics|XVIIIth Winter Olympic Game]], [[Nagano]]{{cite web | url=http://www.nbp.pl/homen.aspx?f=en/banknoty/kolekcjonerskie/1998/nagano_10zl.html | title=XVIIIth Winter Olympic Game coin | publisher=National Bank of Poland| accessdate=2009-01-02}} |- | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Obverse designer:''' Ewa Tyc-KarpiÅska,
'''Reverse designer:''' Robert Kotowicz | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Mint:''' [[Polish Mint|Mennica Polska S.A.]] |- | align=center | '''Value:''' zÅ 10 | align=center | '''Alloy:''' Ag 925/1000 (Silver) | align=center | '''Quantity:''' 30,000 pcs | align=center | '''Quality:''' Proof |- | align=center | '''Issued:''' 25 February 1998 {{cite web | url=http://www.nbp.pl/Homen.aspx?f=en/banknoty/kolekcjonerskie/1998.html | title=Collector coins and 2 zl Nordic Gold coins issued by the NBP in 1998 | publisher=National Bank of Poland| accessdate=2009-01-02}} | align=center | '''Diameter:''' {{convert|32.00|mm|in|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Weight:''' {{convert|14.14|g|oz ozt|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Market value:''' 150 zÅ {{cite journal |title=Cennik monet kolekcjonerskich | journal=PrzeglÄd Numizmatyczny |publisher=Stowarzyszenie NumizmatykÃ³w Polskich - Polish Numismatic Society|volume=63/2008 |issue=4 |pages=23â26 |year=2008 |issn=1231-143X |oclc=68734851 }} |- | colspan="4" align=left | Obverse: An image of the Eagle as the State Emblem of the Polish Republic. On both sides of the Eagle, the date of issue 19-98. Under the Eagle, the legend: ZÅ 10 ZÅ. On the rim the legend: RZECZPOSPOLITA POLSKA preceded and finished with five pearls. Under the left talon of the Eagle the Mint's mark: m/w. Reverse: An image of a competitor on a snowboard. Above the legend: "XVIII/ZIMOWE/IGRZYSKA/OLIMPIJSKIE". On the left side, a stylised outline of [[Mount Fuji]] and a vertical leged: "NAGANO 1998" On the right side: stylised clouds, a snowflake ad a pole. |- | colspan="4" |   |- ! colspan="4" align=center style="background:#eeeeee;"| 45th anniversary of death of General [[Emil August Fieldorf|August Emil Fieldorf]]{{cite web | url=http://www.nbp.pl/homen.aspx?f=en/banknoty/kolekcjonerskie/1998/fieldorf_10zl.html | title=Emil Fieldorf coin | publisher=National Bank of Poland| accessdate=2009-01-02}} |- | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Obverse designer:''' Ewa Tyc-KarpiÅska,
'''Reverse designer:''' Roussanka Nowakowska | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Mint:''' [[Polish Mint|Mennica Polska S.A.]] |- | align=center | '''Value:''' zÅ 10 | align=center | '''Alloy:''' Ag 925 (Silver) | align=center | '''Quantity:''' 17,000 pcs / 14,000 pcs | align=center | '''Quality:''' Proof |- | align=center | '''Issued:''' 7 April 1998 | align=center | '''Diameter:''' {{convert|32.00|mm|in|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Weight:''' {{convert|14.14|g|oz ozt|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Market value:''' 250 zÅ |- | colspan="4" align=left | Obverse: An image of the Eagle as the State Emblem of the Polish Republic. On both sides of the eagle, the date of issue 19-98. Under the Eagle, the legend: ZÅ 10 ZÅ. On the rim the legend: RZECZPOSPOLITA POLSKA preceded and finished with five pearls. Under the left talon of the eagle the Mint's mark m/w. Reverse: The bust of August Emil Fieldorf. On the left side a semi-circular inscription: GEN. BRYG. AUGUST EMIL FIELDORF. On the right side a stylised fragment of a wall with an inscription: "NIL"/1895-/-1953, below the inscription an anchor - the [[Kotwica|symbol of Fighting Poland]]. |- | colspan="4" |   |- ! colspan="4" align=center style="background:#eeeeee;"| ''Polish kings and princes:'' [[Sigismund III Vasa]] (1587â1632){{cite web | url=http://www.nbp.pl/homen.aspx?f=en/banknoty/kolekcjonerskie/1998/waza_100zl.html | title=Sigismund III Vasa coin | publisher=National Bank of Poland| accessdate=2009-01-02}} |- | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Coin designer:''' Ewa Tyc-KarpiÅska | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Mint:''' [[Polish Mint|Mennica Polska S.A.]] |- | align=center | '''Value:''' zÅ 100 | align=center | '''Alloy:''' Au 900/1000 (Gold) | align=center | '''Quantity:''' 2,500 pcs | align=center | '''Quality:''' Proof |- | align=center | '''Issued:''' 29 April 1998 | align=center | '''Diameter:''' {{convert|21.00|mm|in|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Weight:''' {{convert|8.00|g|oz ozt|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Market value:''' 4500 zÅ |- | colspan="4" align=left | Obverse: An image of the Eagle as the State Emblem of the Republic of Poland. An inscription below: ZAMEK W KÃRNIKU. |- | colspan="4" |   |- ! colspan="4" align=center style="background:#eeeeee;"| '''''The Animals of the World:''''' [[Natterjack Toad]] - [[Bufo calamita]]{{cite web | url=http://www.nbp.pl/homen.aspx?f=en/banknoty/kolekcjonerskie/1998/ropucha_20zl.html | title=Bufo calamita coin | publisher=National Bank of Poland| accessdate=2009-01-02}} |- | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Coin designer:''' Ewa Tyc-KarpiÅska | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Mint:''' [[Polish Mint|Mennica Polska S.A.]] |- | align=center | '''Value:''' zÅ 20 | align=center | '''Alloy:''' Ag 925/1000 (Silver) | align=center | '''Quantity:''' 22,000 pcs/ 20,000 pcs | align=center | '''Quality:''' Proof |- | align=center | '''Issued:''' 20 May 1998 | align=center | '''Diameter:''' {{convert|38.61|mm|in|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Weight:''' {{convert|28.28|g|oz ozt|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Market value:''' 800 zÅ |- | colspan="4" align=left | Obverse: An image of the Eagle as the State Emblem of the Republic of Poland. Above the semi-circular inscription in two lines: ROPUCHA PASKÃWKA/Bufo calamita. |- | colspan="4" |   |- ! colspan="4" align=center style="background:#eeeeee;"| 100th anniversary of discovering [[polonium]] and [[radium]]{{cite web | url=http://www.nbp.pl/homen.aspx?f=en/banknoty/kolekcjonerskie/1998/radipolon_20zl.html | title=100th anniversary of discovering polonium and radium coin | publisher=National Bank of Poland| accessdate=2009-01-02}} |- | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Coin designer:''' Robert Kotowicz | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Mint:''' [[Polish Mint|Mennica Polska S.A.]] |- | align=center | '''Value:''' zÅ 20 | align=center | '''Alloy:''' Ag 925/1000 (Silver) | align=center | '''Quantity:''' 20,000 pcs | align=center | '''Quality:''' Proof |- | align=center | '''Issued:''' 17 June 1998 | align=center | '''Diameter:''' {{convert|38.61|mm|in|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Weight:''' {{convert|28.28|g|oz ozt|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Market value:''' 300 zÅ |- | colspan="4" align=left | Obverse: A stylised drawing of an atom. On the right side, below the drawing, the legend: ZÅ 20 ZÅ. Under the drawing, the legend: RZECZPOSPOLITA / POLSKA. Under the legend, the date of issue: 1998. On the left side an image of the Eagle as the State Emblem of the Republic of Poland. Under the left talon of the Eagle the Mint's mark: m/w. Reverse: On the right side, the figures of [[Maria Sklodowska-Curie]] and [[Pierre Curie]] against the background of the symbols of elements in the [[periodic system]]. In the middle, an inscription: 100 - LECIE / ODKRYCIA / POLONU I RADU (100 anniversary of discovering [[polonium]] and [[radium]]) |- | colspan="4" |   |- ! colspan="4" align=center style="background:#eeeeee;"| 20th anniversary of [[Pope John Paul II|John Paul's II]] pontificate (gold){{cite web | url=http://www.nbp.pl/homen.aspx?f=en/banknoty/kolekcjonerskie/1998/pontyfikat_200zl.html | title=20th anniversary of John Paul's II pontificate golden coin | publisher=National Bank of Poland| accessdate=2009-01-02}} |- | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Coin designer:''' Ewa Olszewska-Borys | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Mint:''' [[Polish Mint|Mennica Polska S.A.]] |- | align=center | '''Value:''' zÅ 200 | align=center | '''Alloy:''' Au 900/1000 (Gold) | align=center | '''Quantity:''' 5,000 pcs | align=center | '''Quality:''' Proof |- | align=center | '''Issued:''' 14 October 1998 | align=center | '''Diameter:''' {{convert|27.00|mm|in|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Weight:''' {{convert|15.50|g|oz ozt|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Market value:''' 9000 zÅ |- | colspan="4" align=left | Obverse: An image of a stilised chalice. A semicilcular inscription above: RZECZPOSPOLITA POLSKA. In the middle an image of the Eagle as the State Emblem of the Republic of Poland. On both sides of the Eagle, the date of issue 19-98. In the bottom an inscription: ZÅ 200 ZÅ. Under the left talon of the Eagle the Mint's mark: m/w. Reverse: The figure of [[John Paul II]] with his arms raised. Below it, hands of pilgrims raised on a welcoming gesture. In the background the image of a stilised cross. A semicilcular inscription above: 20-LECIE PONTYFIKATU JANA PAWÅA II. |- | colspan="4" |   |- ! colspan="4" align=center style="background:#eeeeee;"| 20th anniversary of [[Pope John Paul II|John Paul's II]] pontificate (silver){{cite web | url=http://www.nbp.pl/homen.aspx?f=en/banknoty/kolekcjonerskie/1998/pontyfikat_10zl.html | title=20th anniversary of John Paul's II pontificate silver coin | publisher=National Bank of Poland| accessdate=2009-01-02}} |- | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Coin designer:''' Ewa Olszewska-Borys | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Mint:''' [[Polish Mint|Mennica Polska S.A.]] |- | align=center | '''Value:''' zÅ 10 | align=center | '''Alloy:''' Ag 925/1000 (Silver) | align=center | '''Quantity:''' 65,000 pcs | align=center | '''Quality:''' Proof |- | align=center | '''Issued:''' 14 October 1998 | align=center | '''Diameter:''' {{convert|32.00|mm|in|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Weight:''' {{convert|14.14|g|oz ozt|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Market value:''' 220 zÅ |- | colspan="4" align=left | Obverse: An image of a stilised cross. A semicilcular inscription above: RZECZPOSPOLITA POLSKA and the date of issue: 1998. In the bottom, on the left hand side an inscription: 10 zlotych, on the right a stilised letter M. In the top, on the right side an image of the Eagle as the State Emblem of the Republic of Poland. Under the left talon of the Eagle the Mint's mark: m/w. Reverse: The bust of John Paul II with his arms raised. A semicilcular inscription above: 20-LECIE PONTYFIKATU. A semicilcular inscription below: JANA PAWÅA II. |- | colspan="4" |   |- ! colspan="4" align=center style="background:#eeeeee;"| 80th Anniversary of [[Polish independence regained|ragained independence]]{{cite web | url=http://www.nbp.pl/homen.aspx?f=en/banknoty/kolekcjonerskie/1998/niepodleglosc_10zl.html | title=80th Anniversary of ragained independence coin | publisher=National Bank of Poland| accessdate=2009-01-02}} |- | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Coin designer:''' Ewa Tyc-KarpiÅska | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Mint:''' [[Polish Mint|Mennica Polska S.A.]] |- | align=center | '''Value:''' zÅ 10 | align=center | '''Alloy:''' Ag 925/1000 (Silver) | align=center | '''Quantity:''' 20,000 pcs / 14,000 pcs | align=center | '''Quality:''' Proof |- | align=center | '''Issued:''' 9 November 1998 | align=center | '''Diameter:''' {{convert|32.00|mm|in|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Weight:''' {{convert|14.14|g|oz ozt|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Market value:''' 250 zÅ |- | colspan="4" align=left | Obverse: In the central part an image of the Eagle as the State Emblem of the Republic of Poland. Below it, an image of the Eagle as the State Emblem of the Republic of Poland. On the left side of the Eagle, in two lines, an oblique inscription: RZECZPOSPOLITA / POLSKA. Under the left talon of the Eagle the Mint's mark M/W. Reverse: An Image of [[Adam Mickiewicz]]'s head.
